unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn Society of the New Church records
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of records of the Brooklyn Society of the New Church for the period circa 1850 to 1960, including trustees minutes; neighborhood club records; visitors books; minutes of the executive committee; registers of marriages, baptisms, births, and funerals; Sunday school minutes; church committee minutes; scrapbooks; handwritten reminiscences; subscriptions to church expenses; church income reports; the Society's constitution; membership lists; and card files.
